Initialize RDB PostgreSQL database

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
pg_init_db.Rd

Initialize RDB PostgreSQL database

Usage

pg_init_db(
  connection = connect(user = "rdb_admin", password = pg_role_pw("rdb_admin")),
  disconnect = TRUE
)

Arguments

connection

Database connection to a PostgreSQL DBMS as returned by connect(). An S4 object that inherits from DBI::DBIConnection.

disconnect

Whether or not to terminate the database connection when finished.

Value

NULL, invisibly.

See also

Other PostgreSQL functions exec_sql_file(), pg_col_metadata(), pg_drop_tbls(), pg_has_tbl(), pg_init_aux_tbls(), pg_init_main_tbls(), pg_pk(), pg_reset_db(), pg_role_pw(), pg_tbl_constraints(), pg_tbl_del(), pg_tbl_keep(), pg_tbl_update(), read_sql_file(), split_sql_str()
